verses.verse: וַיַּ֖עַן <WH6030> answered אִיּ֥וֹב <WH347> Then Job אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

[יָדַעְתָּ כ] (יָ֭דַעְתִּי <WH3045> acknowledge ק) כִּי־ <WH3588> do כֹ֣ל <WH3605> all תּוּכָ֑ל <WH3201> that thou canst do וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no יִבָּצֵ֖ר <WH1219> can be withholden מִמְּךָ֣ <WH4480> at מְזִמָּֽה׃ <WH4209> every [thing] and [that] no thought

מִ֤י <WH4310> Who זֶ֨ה ׀ <WH2088> is this מַעְלִ֥ים <WH5956> Who [is] he that hideth עֵצָ֗ה <WH6098> counsel בְּֽלִ֫י <WH1097> without דָ֥עַת <WH1847> cunning לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> after that הִ֭גַּדְתִּי <WH5046> have declared וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not אָבִ֑ין <WH995> that I understood נִפְלָא֥וֹת <WH6381> not things too wonderful מִ֝מֶּ֗נִּי <WH4480> too וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not אֵדָֽע׃ <WH3045> for me which I knew
שְֽׁמַֽע־ <WH8085> Hear נָ֭א <WH4994> now וְאָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> and I אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> I beseech thee and I will speak אֶ֝שְׁאָלְךָ֗ <WH7592> I will demand וְהוֹדִיעֵֽנִי׃ <WH3045> of thee and declare
לְשֵֽׁמַע־ <WH8085> I have heard אֹ֥זֶן <WH241> of the ear שְׁמַעְתִּ֑יךָ <WH8088> of thee by the hearing וְ֝עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now עֵינִ֥י <WH5869> but now mine eye רָאָֽתְךָ׃ <WH7200> seeth
עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֭ן <WH3651> after that אֶמְאַ֣ס <WH3988> Wherefore I abhor וְנִחַ֑מְתִּי <WH5162> [myself] and repent עַל־ <WH5921> in עָפָ֥ר <WH6083> in dust וָאֵֽפֶר׃ <WH665> and ashes פ

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַחַ֨ר <WH310> And it was [so] that after דִּבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> had spoken יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these אֶל־ <WH413> to אִיּ֑וֹב <WH347> unto Job וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱלִיפַ֣ז <WH464> to Eliphaz הַתֵּֽימָנִ֗י <WH8489> the Temanite חָרָ֨ה <WH2734> is kindled אַפִּ֤י <WH639> My wrath בְךָ֙ וּבִשְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> against thee and against thy two רֵעֶ֔יךָ <WH7453> friends כִּ֠י <WH3588> because לֹ֣א <WH3808> have not דִבַּרְתֶּ֥ם <WH1696> for ye have not spoken אֵלַ֛י <WH413> is נְכוֹנָ֖ה <WH3559> of me [the thing that is] right כְּעַבְדִּ֥י <WH5650> as my servant אִיּֽוֹב׃ <WH347> Job

וְעַתָּ֡ה <WH6258> Now קְחֽוּ־ <WH3947> Therefore take לָכֶ֣ם שִׁבְעָֽה־ <WH7651> unto you now seven פָרִים֩ <WH6499> bullocks וְשִׁבְעָ֨ה <WH7651> and seven אֵילִ֜ים <WH352> rams וּלְכ֣וּ ׀ <WH1980> and go אֶל־ <WH413> to עַבְדִּ֣י <WH5650> to my servant אִיּ֗וֹב <WH347> Job וְהַעֲלִיתֶ֤ם <WH5927> and offer up עוֹלָה֙ <WH5930> for yourselves a burnt offering בַּֽעַדְכֶ֔ם <WH1157> about וְאִיּ֣וֹב <WH347> Job עַבְדִּ֔י <WH5650> and my servant יִתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <WH6419> shall pray עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> and כִּ֧י <WH3588> because אִם־ <WH518> for פָּנָ֣יו <WH6440> for you for him אֶשָּׂ֗א <WH5375> will I accept לְבִלְתִּ֞י <WH1115> so עֲשׂ֤וֹת <WH6213> lest I deal עִמָּכֶם֙ <WH5973> with נְבָלָ֔ה <WH5039> with you [after your] folly כִּ֠י <WH3588> because לֹ֣א <WH3808> have not דִבַּרְתֶּ֥ם <WH1696> in that ye have not spoken אֵלַ֛י <WH413> is נְכוֹנָ֖ה <WH3559> of me [the thing which is] right כְּעַבְדִּ֥י <WH5650> like my servant אִיּֽוֹב׃ <WH347> Job

וַיֵּלְכוּ֩ <WH1980> went אֱלִיפַ֨ז <WH464> So Eliphaz הַתֵּֽימָנִ֜י <WH8489> the Temanite וּבִלְדַּ֣ד <WH1085> and Bildad הַשּׁוּחִ֗י <WH7747> the Shuhite צֹפַר֙ <WH6691> [and] Zophar הַנַּ֣עֲמָתִ֔י <WH5284> the Naamathite וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> and did כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> commanded אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> as יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> according as the LORD וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> also accepted יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> them the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> accept אִיּֽוֹב׃ <WH347> Job

וַֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD שָׁ֚ב <WH7725> turned אֶת־ <WH853> [שְׁבִית כ] (שְׁב֣וּת <WH7622> captive ק) אִיּ֔וֹב <WH347> of Job בְּהִֽתְפַּֽלְל֖וֹ <WH6419> when he prayed בְּעַ֣ד <WH1157> for רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> for his friends וַ֧יֹּסֶף <WH3254> gave יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> also the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that לְאִיּ֖וֹב <WH347> Job לְמִשְׁנֶֽה׃ <WH4932> twice as much

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> Then came אֵ֠לָיו <WH413> then כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֶחָ֨יו <WH251> there unto him all his brethren וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all [אַחְיֹתָיו כ] (אַחְיֹותָ֜יו <WH269> other ק) וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יֹדְעָ֣יו <WH3045> and all they that had been of his acquaintance לְפָנִ֗ים <WH6440> before וַיֹּאכְל֨וּ <WH398> and did eat עִמּ֣וֹ <WH5973> with לֶחֶם֮ <WH3899> bread בְּבֵיתוֹ֒ <WH1004> with him in his house וַיָּנֻ֤דוּ <WH5110> and they bemoaned לוֹ֙ וַיְנַחֲמ֣וּ <WH5162> him and comforted אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> עַ֚ל <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> for all הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> him over all the evil אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after הֵבִ֥יא <WH935> had brought יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that the LORD עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> also gave ל֗וֹ אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> upon him every man קְשִׂיטָ֣ה <WH7192> piece of money אֶחָ֔ת <WH259> him a וְאִ֕ישׁ <WH376> and every one נֶ֥זֶם <WH5141> an earring זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one ס

וַֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> So the LORD בֵּרַ֛ךְ <WH1288> blessed אֶת־ <WH853> אַחֲרִ֥ית <WH319> the latter end אִיּ֖וֹב <WH347> of Job מֵרֵאשִׁת֑וֹ <WH7225> more than his beginning וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> become ל֡וֹ אַרְבָּעָה֩ <WH702> four עָשָׂ֨ר <WH6240> teen אֶ֜לֶף <WH505> thousand צֹ֗אן <WH6629> sheep וְשֵׁ֤שֶׁת <WH8337> and six אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> thousand גְּמַלִּ֔ים <WH1581> camels וְאֶֽלֶף־ <WH505> and a thousand צֶ֥מֶד <WH6776> yoke בָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> of oxen וְאֶ֥לֶף <WH505> and a thousand אֲתוֹנֽוֹת׃ <WH860> she asses
וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> had ל֛וֹ שִׁבְעָ֥נָה <WH7658> He had also seven בָנִ֖ים <WH1121> sons וְשָׁל֥וֹשׁ <WH7969> and three בָּנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> daughters

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> And he called שֵׁם־ <WH8034> the name הָֽאַחַת֙ <WH259> of the first יְמִימָ֔ה <WH3224> Jemima וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> of the second קְצִיעָ֑ה <WH7103> Kezia וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and the name הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֖ית <WH7992> of the third קֶ֥רֶן הַפּֽוּךְ׃ <WH7163> Kerenhappuch

וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> no נִמְצָ֜א <WH4672> found נָשִׁ֥ים <WH802> were no women יָפ֛וֹת <WH3303> [so] fair כִּבְנ֥וֹת <WH1323> as the daughters אִיּ֖וֹב <WH347> of Job בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> And in all the land וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> gave לָהֶ֧ם <WH1992> like אֲבִיהֶ֛ם <WH1> and their father נַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> them inheritance בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> among אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH251> their brethren ס

וַיְחִ֤י <WH2421> this lived אִיּוֹב֙ <WH347> Job אַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH310> After זֹ֔את <WH2063> likewise מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> an hundred וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> and forty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years [וַיַּרְא כ] (וַיִּרְאֶ֗ה <WH7200> advise self ק) אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָיו֙ <WH1121> his sons וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> and his sons' בָנָ֔יו <WH1121> sons אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> [even] four דֹּרֽוֹת׃ <WH1755> generations
וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> died אִיּ֔וֹב <WH347> So Job זָקֵ֖ן <WH2205> [being] old וּשְׂבַ֥ע <WH7649> and full יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> of days
